control.name: chkShowToolbar
control.description: Sets whether toolbars should be displayed in filter popup windows.

control.name: chkAllowContextMenu
control.description: Sets whether right-clicking a filter popup window invokes a context menu.

control.name: chkAllowTree
control.description: Sets filtering mode used for the field owner group.

control.name: chkShowOnlyAvailableItems
control.description: The Show Only Available Items button controls the visibility of filter items that cannot be displayed because of filtering applied to other fields.

control.name: chkIncrementalSearch
control.description: The Incremental Search button controls whether the incremental searching feature is enabled or not. This feature allows end-users to locate an item in the drop-down by typing the item's initial characters.

control.name: chkRadioMode
control.description: The Radio Mode button that controls whether end-users are allowed to check only a single item or multiple items.

control.name: chkShowNewValues
control.description: The Show New Field Values button controls the visibility of field values that have appeared in the datasource after the field's filtering was configured.

control.name: chkMultiSelection
control.description: The Multi-Selection button controls whether end-users are allowed to select only a single item or multiple items.

control.name: chkInvertFilter
control.description: The Invert Filter button inverts the checked state for all filter items.
